text: Lipscomb University is a private, coeducational university in Nashville, Tennessee. The university has about 3,742 students. It was founded in 1891. The current president of the university is Candice McQueen. ==Sports== The athletics teams of the university are called the Bisons and they compete in the Atlantic Sun Conference. ==Other websites== *Lipscomb University's Official website *Lipscomb Bisons' Official athletics website Category:Atlantic Sun Conference Category:Colleges and universities in Nashville, Tennessee Category:1891 establishments in the United States Category:19th-century establishments in Tennessee
title: Lipscomb University
